fields.name: KeyToSign
fields.description: The key to sign the account SAS token with.

fields.name: SignedExpiry
fields.description: The time at which the shared access signature becomes invalid.

fields.name: SignedIP
fields.description: An IP address or a range of IP addresses from which to accept requests.

fields.name: SignedPermission
fields.description: The signed permissions for the account SAS. Possible values include: Read (r), Write (w), Delete (d), List (l), Add (a), Create (c), Update (u) and Process (p).

fields.name: SignedProtocol
fields.description: The protocol permitted for a request made with the account SAS.

fields.name: SignedResourceTypes
fields.description: The signed resource types that are accessible with the account SAS. Service (s): Access to service-level APIs; Container (c): Access to container-level APIs; Object (o): Access to object-level APIs for blobs, queue messages, table entities, and files.

fields.name: SignedServices
fields.description: The signed services accessible with the account SAS. Possible values include: Blob (b), Queue (q), Table (t), File (f).

fields.name: SignedStart
fields.description: The time at which the SAS becomes valid.
